objects.description: [APT33](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Group/G0003) sent spear phishing emails containing links to HTML application files, which were embedded with malicious code.(Citation: FireEye APT33 Sept 2017) APT33 has conducted targeted spear phishing campaigns against U.S. government agencies and private sector companies.(Citation: Wired Jun 2019)

external_references.description: O'Leary, J., et al. (2017, September 20). Insights into Iranian Cyber Espionage: APT33 Targets Aerospace and Energy Sectors and has Ties to Destructive Malware. Retrieved February 15, 2018.
Andy Greenburg. (2019, June 20). Iranian Hackers Launch a New US-Targeted Campaign as Tensions Mount. Retrieved January 3, 2020.
